title: Fantasy Fiesta - Novel Updates
author: Luz Balthasaar
description:
*This is an anthology.

Was it possible that your beloved cat comes from space?

Would Pungguk love reached the Gadis Bintang?

What will happened if the King would execute all who said “Aku”?

What would you do, if Death gave you 16 minutes to be with your loved people?

And what was the difference between false and real if both of them can made miracles?

Fantasy Fiesta 2011 again dare Indonesia to write their dreams. 20 best stories from the writer of Fiksi Fantasi Indonesia in 2011, dedicated to those who yearn for the dream land>
